login_failed_text: Sign-in failed. Please try again or contact support if issue continues.
home_hero_title: Generate An Audience For Your Music
home_hero_subtitle: Your music deserves to be heard. Pitch your music to our selection of trusted Spotify playlist curators.
home_create_campaign_step_1_text: Find your music on spotify using the track id or url
home_create_campaign_step_2_text: Choose the genres that best fit your music. We have a vast list of genres so our clients always have the specific genre for their music.
home_create_campaign_step_3_text: After you choose your genres, we will provide you with a list of playlists that match your selected genres. You can choose to listen to these playlists and decide if you want us to pitch your music to the playlist curator.
home_create_campaign_step_4_text: Pay for your campaign and we will take care of the rest!
home_payment_subtitle: Customize your playlist selections to match your budget
home_trust_text: As musicians ourselves, we believe in providing a product that helps independent and established artists to grow their fan-base. We meticulously vet all our playlist curators and make sure our customers have the best experience when using our services. Give us a try now.
home_contact_text: We would love to answer. Call or message us and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
home_features_title: A platform built for your success!
home_features_1_text: We know you love Spotify, so we've made our integration as smooth as possible.
home_features_2_text: Submit songs and playlists in minutes with our user friendly platform.
home_features_3_text: Automatically submit to playlists using our Automatic Submission tool.
dashboard_home_subtitle: Bring your songs to a wider audience in seconds
campaign_stepper_track_instruction: Paste Your Track's Spotify URL or ID to Begin
campaign_stepper_track_select_error_mess: You must find a track before you can proceed
campaign_stepper_genre_title: Choose one or more genres that best describe your music
campaign_stepper_genre_select_error_mess: You must select one or more genres for your music before you can proceed.
campaign_stepper_contact_information_1: Confirm or update your contact information
campaign_stepper_contact_information_2: Playlist curators will use one of the contact information below to notify you if they add your song to their playlist
campaign_stepper_review_title: Your track will be sent to :param playlist curators for consideration!
playlist_selection_text: You can select/unselect a playlist to adjust the price to your budget.
validation_rules_name_length: Name must be less than 50 characters.
validation_rules_password_length: Password must be 8 characters or more.
validation_rules_track_id_required: Track Url or ID is required.
notification_contact_message_sent: Your message has been sent! We will get in touch with you shortly
notification_contact_message_error: Unable to send your message. Please try again later
notification_registration_success: Registration successful! You can now login with your registered credentials
notification_registration_error: Registration failed. Please try again or contact us if issue continues
notification_create_campaign_track_not_f: Your track was not found. Please paste track url or id
